name: Rolling^2
description:
A 3D project by three Third year students at Uppsala University Campus Gotland.
Game listed for Gotland Game Conference 2022
 
Controls:

Logitech 3D Extreme Joystick:
Joystick: Movement
Trigger: Drift
Slider: Max Speed
Button 12: Respawn (Testing function)

PC:
WASD: Movement
RightControlButton : Drift
Up Arrow: Increase Max speed by 10 (Maximum 120)
Down Arrow: Decrease Max speed by 10 (Minimum 0)
M: Mute Music (Not SFX)
R: Respawn/Reset Player (Testing function)
